channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: AI agents and the future of identity: What’s on the minds of your peers?
item.description: At Identiverse 2025, identity professionals from around the world gathered for a roundtable session hosted by Microsoft Security to explore a pressing question: What does comprehensive identity and access management (IAM) look like in a world of AI agents? The roundtable discussions brought together 149 attendees—thought leaders, software companies, security leaders and practitioners spanning industries such as finance, healthcare, government, and tech. The goal was not to pitch solutions, but to surface the challenges, share perspectives, and begin shaping a shared understanding of what’s nee...
